task.title: Delete an Operation
task.shortdesc: You can delete an operation if it is no longer needed to produce the product using the route.

ul.li: If you have made any changes to the route, save the changes.

step.cmd: In the Route Management page, select the route for which you want to delete an operation.
In the left pane, select in the row containing the operation that you want to delete.
step.stepresult: A message appears, asking you to confirm that you want to delete the operation.

step.cmd: Select Yes, and then select Save.

taskbody.result: The operation is deleted.The equipment linked to the operation is not deleted.
